scripts.tms:features:test: rm -rf ui/assets/allure-results-tms-test && rm -rf ui/assets/allure-report-tms-test && cross-env test_env=tms-test playwright test --config=./ui/config/playwright.config.ts
scripts.tms:features:test:report: allure generate ui/assets/allure-results-tms-test --clean -o ui/assets/allure-report-tms-test && allure open ui/assets/allure-report-tms-test
scripts.tms:features:prod: rm -rf ui/assets/allure-results-tms-prod && rm -rf ui/assets/allure-report-tms-prod && cross-env test_env=tms-prod playwright test --config=./ui/config/playwright.config.ts
scripts.tms:features:prod:report: allure generate ui/assets/allure-results-tms-prod --clean -o ui/assets/allure-report-tms-prod && allure open ui/assets/allure-report-tms-prod
